data.title: Solutions for Individuals with Hearing Loss
data.meta_description: Backed by over a decade of proven captioned telephone technology, Hamilton CapTel is dedicated to making phone conversations simple and accessible for individuals with hearing loss.
data.text:
Hamilton Mobile™ CapTel® for iOS and Android™

*Mobile device not included.

Place and receive captioned telephone calls with our unique and innovative app for iOS and Android devices. Hamilton Mobile CapTel is compatible with many of the latest smartphones and tablets, on most wireless networks.

If you just can’t hear on the phone, Hamilton CapTel allows you to listen and read what’s said to you – ensuring clarity and confidence on every call. Hamilton CapTel is available 24/7 and is a nationwide service made available at no cost to the user. So whether you’re at home, in the office or on the go, captions from Hamilton CapTel are available for every call.

Live Chat is available during the following hours:

Monday – Friday:

8:30 AM to 12:30 AM Eastern

Saturday, Sunday:

11:00 AM to 6:30 PM Eastern
